column4: Can someone recommend a good gtk/gnome network managing utility for edgy. I have three of four spots I go to , and some require me to have static ip's, and I've yet to find a solution that lets me easily do either, that works. network-admin seems to be the closest except, it hangs from time to time, and then my wireless is totally broken.
I like wifi radar, but then I can't manage my wire interface
